It encompasses social, economic and cultural conditions that enable the free and equal practice of political self-determination."

Wikipedia Democracy ebook. Selected articles from Wikipedia related to Democracy in .epub format. 

This book is part of the radical seed collection; and for independent researchers
looking to followup the citations and further readings, you can find most of them in the radical seed (https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9389639/Op_Radical_Seed).
